DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; YEMEN ; THREAT OF CIVIL WAR RAISED OVER CLASHES
DOC.TEXT: Officials from southern Yemen claimed that northern soldiers were besieging remnants of a routed southern brigade near the capital , Sana , and threatened to declare war . The north said 79 people had died in the three days of fighting . Western diplomats and northern officials had previously estimated as_many as 2 # 000 casualties .
